Title: Extends current exemptions of income and resources for public assistance programs
Summary: Extends current exemptions of income and resources for public assistance programs under the welfare reform act of 1997.
LawCode: Amd Part B ยง153, Chap 436 of 1997
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 436 of the laws of 1997, constituting the welfare reform act of 1997, in relation to extending the current exemptions of income and resources for public assistance programs
